channel.title: You can only attack if you have a weapon
channel.description: I need some help to make it so you can only attack if you have a weapon. I'm clueless where to start.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 08:05:36 PM[/size][hr]anyone know?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 08:15:59 PM[/size][hr]Hands are -1 correct?

try the search engine, or rune-server search engine.

item.title: You can only attack if you have a weapon
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

When I attack a npc the timers work and it sends the message. But when I attack a player the timers don’t work and it doesn’t even send the message. Heres what I got so far

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1)) { //no weapons hands PkingDelay = 2; wepdelay = 2; LoopHitDelay = 7; sendMessage("A weapon is needed to attack!");[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 09:08:49 PM[/size][hr]I even added

[code]/HANDS/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1))

//Hands
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
LoopHitDelay = 8;
}[/code] and it still doesn’t work when your pking.

Does anyone know a way to just take out attacking with hands?

Read full topic
item.source: You can only attack if you have a weapon

item.title: You can only attack if you have a weapon
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

I wonder…
This might work

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1)) { sendMessage("A weapon is needed to attack!"); } else { //stuff }
That’s my crude thoughts on how it could work.

Read full topic
